src_text: Su dot. Ehud Ur, professore de meighina in s’Universidade de Dalhousie in Halifax, Iscòtzia Noa, e presidente de sa divisione clìnica e iscientìfica de s’Assòtziu Diabète de su Cànada, at amonestadu chi sa chirca est galu a su cumintzu.
ref_text: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.

[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.

[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

src_text: Sas cabras domèsticas generalmente fiant pesadas in tàgios chi paschiant in sos cùcuros o àteras àreas de pastura, a s’ispissu atèndidos dae carbàrgios chi fiant giai semper pipios o pitzocos, sìmiles a sos pastore de arveghes prus connotos. hyp_text: Bipedal specializations are found in 4.2-3.9 million-year-old Australopithecus fossils, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as far back as seven million years ago.

[Sardinian]: Mancari gasi, totu sos belgas e isvìtzeros chi faeddant frantzesu diant àere dèpidu imparare su frantzesu istandard in s’iscola, tando ti diant dèpere pòdere cumprèndere fintzas si impreas su sistema de nùmeros frantzesu istandard.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Sardinian]: Dae su cumintzu, The Onion est istada a beru un’imperu de sa parodia de sas noas, cun un’editzione imprentada, unu situ cun 5000000 bisitadores solos in su mese de Ledàmine, annùntzios personales, unu canale 24 oras de noas, podcast, e un’atlante de su mundu publicadu dae pagu, numenadu Our Dumb World.
